name: Carnival Ball
description:
Carnival Ball is a puzzle game in which a player's goal is to hit the final goal space after spilling all the paint blocks on his way

LEVELS
There are many many obstructions and traps on your way to the goal. For example - loop holes that will eat your ball and your level will be lost, walls and lasers that will block you from hitting the goal.

There are three different color blocks - Red Block, Blue Block and Green Block. There are also whirls, walls and patrolling walls that serve as obstacles on your way to the goal.

Combine the moves and plan the line of strike to pass all the levels. Good luck!
